After riding on one of Kakuzu's masked beasts towards the enemy, Hidan slashes the opponent with his [[Triple-Bladed Scythe|scythe]] and curses them with his [[Curse Technique: Death Controlling Possessed Blood]]. Kakuzu then uses [[Fire Release: Intelligent Hard Work]], [[Lightning Release: False Darkness]] and [[Wind Release: Pressure Damage]] on Hidan, creating a great explosion. Because of Hidan's curse, the opponent takes the same damage as he did.
